name: df-hodif
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(chod, cmpo(s0, s1, co(chba, cmap, chba), co(chba, cmap, chba), cmpt(s2, chba, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cmv, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
comment: Define the difference of two Hilbert space operators. Definition of [Beran] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
